ChatMapperProject.Title: UFPS Dialogue
ChatMapperProject.Author: Pixel Crushers
ChatMapperProject.Description: This project contains dialogue for the UFPS integration examples.

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor, used as portrait images.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description
Field.Value: The player controls a lieutenant sent to assassinate the evil Emperor and free the star system from tyranny.

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor, used as portrait images.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description
Field.Value: The squad's technical expert, Hart refuses to kill the innocent attendees.

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Hint: A name to reference this item or quest. Use underscores instead of spaces so simulator Lua code works. Use underscores instead of spaces in Lua code.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A description of this item or quest.
Field.Title: Description
Field.Value: Private Harts needs a pistol. Return to him when you have one.

Field.Hint: The description of the quest when the player has completed it successfully.
Field.Title: Success Description
Field.Value: You gave Private Hart a pistol.

Field.Hint: The description of the quest when the player has completed it in failure.
Field.Title: Failure Description

Field.Hint: The state of the quest: unassigned, active, success, or failure
Field.Title: State

Field.Hint: The title of this conversation.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: A short description of what happens in this conversation.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: The actor who is doing most of the talking, or initiates this conversation.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is approached or is mostly talked to.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The title of this dialogue.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text

Field.Title: Video File

Field.Title: Sequence
